name: df-qp
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4, setvar s5, setvar s6, setvar s7
body: |- wceq(cqp, cmpt(s0, cprime, csb(s3, crab(s1, co(cz, cmap, co(nat0, cfz, co(cv(s0), cmin, nat1))), wrex(s2, crn(cuz), wss(cima(ccnv(cv(s1)), cdif(cz, csn(nat0))), cv(s2)))), co(cun(ctp(cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), cv(s3)), cop(cfv(cplusg, cnx), cmpo(s4, s5, cv(s3), cv(s3), cfv(cfv(crqp, cv(s0)), co(cv(s4), cof(caddc), cv(s5))))), cop(cfv(cmulr, cnx), cmpo(s4, s5, cv(s3), cv(s3), cfv(cfv(crqp, cv(s0)), cmpt(s6, cz, csu(s7, cz, co(cfv(cv(s4), cv(s7)), cmul, cfv(cv(s5), co(cv(s6), cmin, cv(s7)))))))))), csn(cop(cfv(cple, cnx), copab(s4, s5, wa(wss(cpr(cv(s4), cv(s5)), cv(s3)), wbr(csu(s7, cz, co(cfv(cv(s4), cneg(cv(s7))), cmul, co(co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1), cexp, cneg(cv(s7))))), clt, csu(s7, cz, co(cfv(cv(s5), cneg(cv(s7))), cmul, co(co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1), cexp, cneg(cv(s7))))))))))), ctng, cmpt(s4, cv(s3), cif(nat0, co(cv(s0), cexp, cneg(cinf(cima(ccnv(cv(s4)), cdif(cz, csn(nat0))), cr, clt))), wceq(cv(s4), cxp(cz, csn(nat0)))))))))
comment: Define the ` p ` -adic completion of the rational numbers, as a normed field structure with a total order (that is not compatible with the operations). (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 2-Dec-2014.) (Revised by AV, 10-Oct-2021.)
